title: Kali Willows BUNDLE
description: What could a vampire, ghost, witch, dragons and a castle in Spain possibly have in common? The mystical matchmaking services of Madame Evangeline for the romantically impaired, of course!Kali Willows shadows worlds of passion and intrigue in five erotic tales that are filled with toe curling desire, surprising twists, danger, and infused with a little humor that will leave you laughing, crying and clenching the book in anticipation.
author: Kali Willows
